languages.text: {n}Человек несколько секунд переваривает ваш ответ.{/n} "Будьте Троном благословлены, {name}. Ну а я Вир... просто Вир".

traits.locale_text: {n}Человек несколько секунд переваривает ваш ответ.{/n} "Будьте Троном благословлены, {name}. Ну а я Вир... просто Вир".

languages.text: {n}It takes the man several seconds to digest your answer.{/n} "May you be blessed by the Throne, {name}. And I am Vir... just Vir."
languages.original_text: {n}Человек несколько секунд переваривает ваш ответ.{/n} "Будьте Троном благословлены, {name}. Ну а я Вир... просто Вир".

traits.locale_text: {n}It takes the man several seconds to digest your answer.{/n} "May you be blessed by the Throne, {name}. And I am Vir. A scout for the Children of Redemption."

{n}It takes the man several seconds to digest your answer.{/n} "May you be blessed by the Throne, {name}. And I am Vir... just Vir."

languages.text: {n}这个人花了几秒钟才理解你的意思。{/n}“愿黄金王座祝福你，{name}。我叫维尔……就是维尔。”
languages.original_text: {n}It takes the man several seconds to digest your answer.{/n} "May you be blessed by the Throne, {name}. And I am Vir... just Vir."

traits.locale_text: {n}这个人花了几秒钟才理解你的意思。{/n}“愿黄金王座祝福你，{name}。我叫维尔……就是维尔。”

languages.text: {n}El hombre tarda unos segundos en procesar tu respuesta.{/n} «Que el Trono le bendiga, {name}. En cuanto a mí, soy Vir... solo Vir».
languages.original_text: {n}It takes the man several seconds to digest your answer.{/n} "May you be blessed by the Throne, {name}. And I am Vir... just Vir."

traits.locale_text: {n}El hombre tarda unos segundos en procesar tu respuesta.{/n} «Que el Trono le bendiga, {name}. En cuanto a mí, soy Vir... solo Vir».

languages.text: {n}男がこちらの質問を咀嚼するのにしばらくかかった。{/n}「王座に祝福を、{name}。私はヴィル…ただのヴィルです」
languages.original_text: {n}It takes the man several seconds to digest your answer.{/n} "May you be blessed by the Throne, {name}. And I am Vir... just Vir."

traits.locale_text: {n}男がこちらの質問を咀嚼するのにしばらくかかった。{/n}「王座に祝福を、{name}。私はヴィル…ただのヴィルです」

languages.text: {n}Es dauert einige Sekunden, bis der Mann deine Antwort verarbeitet hat.{/n} "Der Thron möge Euch segnen, {name}. Und ich bin Vir ... einfach nur Vir."
languages.original_text: {n}It takes the man several seconds to digest your answer.{/n} "May you be blessed by the Throne, {name}. And I am Vir... just Vir."

traits.locale_text: {n}Es dauert einige Sekunden, bis der Mann deine Antwort verarbeitet hat.{/n} "Der Thron möge Euch segnen, {name}. Und ich bin Vir ... einfach nur Vir."

languages.text: {n}L'homme met quelques instants à digérer votre réponse.{/n} « Le Trône vous bénisse, {name}. Moi, c'est Vir... Vir tout court. »
languages.original_text: {n}It takes the man several seconds to digest your answer.{/n} "May you be blessed by the Throne, {name}. And I am Vir... just Vir."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'homme met quelques instants à digérer votre réponse.{/n} « Le Trône vous bénisse, {name}. Moi, c'est Vir... Vir tout court. »

languages.text: {n}Adam, verdiğin cevabı birkaç dakikada anca sindiriyor.{/n} "Taht sizi kutsasın {name}. Ben Vir... Sadece Vir."
languages.original_text: {n}It takes the man several seconds to digest your answer.{/n} "May you be blessed by the Throne, {name}. And I am Vir... just Vir."

traits.locale_text: {n}Adam birkaç dakika boyunca verdiğin cevabı sindirmeye çalışıyor.{/n} "Taht sizi kutsasın {name}. Ben Vir... Sadece Vir."
